title: Suspect facing hate crime and terrorism charges in shooting of Jewish man in Chicago dies in apparent suicide, sheriff says
description: A man facing felony terrorism and hate crime charges after authorities said he shot a Jewish man and fired at responding officers during an October shootout in Chicago has died by apparent suicide, the Cook County Sheriffâ€™s Office said.

title: School shootings in the US: Fast facts
description: CNN is tracking school shootings across the United States. Follow the numbers here.

title: Trial of White homeowner in shooting of Black teen who rang wrong doorbell can proceed, judge rules
description: The prosecution of an 86-year-old White man charged in the April 2023 shooting of a Black teenager in Kansas City, Missouri, is set to proceed, a judge said Tuesday.

title: Rally held for baby, mother killed in Independence police shooting
description: The family of a woman and a baby killed by Independence police is demanding the release of unedited body camera footage.

title: Two teens shot in Kansas City on Bristol Terrace; One in critical condition
description: Kansas City police are investigating a double shooting in the 11200 block of Bristol Terrace.

title: Independence police release bodycam footage of shooting that killed woman, infant
description: The Independence Police Department released body-camera footage on Wednesday of a shooting that resulted in the deaths of a mother and an infant.

title: Independence man charged in fatal shooting, faces multiple felonies
description: Steven B. Rock faces charges of second-degree murder, two counts of armed criminal action, unlawful use of a weapon, and abandonment of a corpse.

title: Man hospitalized after shooting in Raytown
description: Raytown police said no one is in custody.

title: Man dies in hospital after arriving from shooting scene
description: The patient showed up at Research Medical Center early Sunday morning with a gunshot wound.

title: Trial against man accused of shooting Ralph Yarl to proceed in February
description: The trial of 85-year-old Andrew Lester, accused in an April 2023 shooting that injured 16-year-old Ralph Yarl, will proceed in February.

title: Victim identified after shooting, crash in Merriam, Kansas
description: A man is dead after a disturbance at a construction site on Shawnee Mission Parkway led to a shooting and subsequent crash.

title: 26-year-old woman killed, another hurt in shooting after large fight in Kansas City
description: Police believe the incident started as a large fight with multiple people outside an apartment.

title: Kansas City man sentenced to 40 years for fatal shooting of pregnant woman
description: Emmett C. Williams, 34, pleaded guilty in June to two counts of second-degree murder and two counts of armed criminal action.

title: FBI agent involved in shooting during investigation at Northland home
description: A large portion of the area has been blocked by dozens of law enforcement vehicles.
